name: Blob with Gun Running About
description:
Known Bug: when clicking outside the game window, the movement is not working anymore. Scroll with your mouse wheel to enable it again. Sorry for the inconvenience, will fix it as soon as the rating is over and uploads are allowed again.

What's this?

A short game made for the Bullet Hell Jam 2022.

How to play?

Use WASD to move about and the mouse to aim and shoot.

Use the right mouse button to run.

Destroy all enemies in a level to open the barrier and to proceed to the next level.

There are 5 levels in the game.

Credits

Sound Effects created with Chiptone (https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone)

Music: Through Space (https://opengameart.org/content/through-space)

  • Created by maxstack (https://maxstack.bandcamp.com/)
